review: Love this product I have a roku the $100 dollar one and man this small Amazon stick out performed the roku to bad I can't return that roku it always froze and took to long to load on every app I really love my Fire TV stck it's
author: MROD

review: I really have enjoyed the device. It has worked well since I have gotten it. The only reason it does not have five stars is because sometimes it has a mind of it's own and switches apps or shuts down, but that has only happened a few times.
author: jtread25

review: So many of the apps don't work and aren't compatible with most tv's im very dissapointed and have to return 4 of them
author: ashley joiner

review: I really like it, remote app is a little glitchy but I'm hoping it will improve in time. No brainer purchase for Prime members especially those with Netflix.
author: Sergio R Schubert

review: Half the programs dont work in this region !
author: Devan

review: I love the Fire Stick! The only complain that I have is with the remote. If you accidentally click it, it will change to the input station that the Fire Stick is plugged into. I dont know if it works this way with all tvs or if its just mine.
author: KJanelle

review: It was everything I wanted. Pretty great for prime movies and Netflix!
author: Cortsar

review: Very best streaming tool that I've seen. Absolutely no complaints and will be buying at least 1 more.
author: Kelly

review: We like this when we have the time to use it!
author: Carol S.
